nodes.text: Spinner's Web  was a criminal and anarchist gang on the planet Kesh during the time of Hilts Restoration. They were led by Parlan Spinner, the descendant of the ancient Lost Tribe outcast Ermon Parrah. In 2974 BBY, all members of Spinner's Web with the exception of Spinner himself were killed following a failed assassination attempt on the Grand Lord Varner Hilts at the Sith capital of Tahv.
